info.name: Bidding process API
info.description:
An API to perform Bidding process operations

Contact Support:
 Name: Natasa Jovanovic
 Email: nj55078@gmail.com

item.name: BiddingConditions
{id}
Retrieves a specific Bidding conditions from the database based on the given id.

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding conditions to retrieve.

response.name: Returns Bidding conditions DTO with the given id

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding conditions to retrieve.

response.name: There is no bidding conditions with this id.

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding conditions to retrieve.

item.name: Updates a set of Bidding Conditions in the database, changing all attributes except for the primary key.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to update.

response.name: Returns updated Bidding Conditions as a BiddingConditionsDTO

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to update.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Bidding Conditions with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to update.

item.name: Deletes a specific set of Bidding Conditions from the database.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to delete.

response.name: Returns deleted Bidding Conditions

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to delete.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Bidding Conditions with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding Conditions to delete.

item.name: Retrieves all Bidding conditionss from the database.

response.name: Returns list of Bidding conditions

item.name: Adds a new Bidding Conditions to the database.

response.name: Success
Returns newly created Bidding Conditions

item.name: Biddings
{id}
Retrieves a specific Bidding from the database based on the given id.

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding to retrieve.

response.name: Returns Bidding  DTO with the given id

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding to retrieve.

response.name: There is no bidding with given id.

variable.description: (Required) The id of the Bidding to retrieve.

item.name: Deletes the Bidding entity with the specified ID from the repository.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be deleted.

response.name: Returns deleted Bidding

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be deleted.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Bidding with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be deleted.

item.name: Updates the specified Bidding entity in the repository with the provided DTO values.

body.raw:
{
  "biddingCode": "culpa est deserunt",
  "type": "Ut velit aliqua",
  "status": "Ut incididunt",
  "excepted": true,
  "startingPrice": -23462120,
  "dateOfMaintenance": "1950-12-28T13:38:53.882Z",
  "startTime": "1950-05-23T21:04:27.424Z",
  "endTime": "1959-02-21T15:41:06.192Z"
}

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be updated.

response.name: Returns updated Bidding as a BiddingDTO

body.raw:
{
  "biddingCode": "culpa est deserunt",

  "dateOfMaintenance": "1950-12-28T13:38:53.882Z",

  "endTime": "1959-02-21T15:41:06.192Z"
}

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be updated.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Bidding with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Bidding entity to be updated.

item.name: Retrieves all Biddings from the database.

response.name: Returns list of Biddings

item.name: Creates a new Bidding entity from the provided DTO and adds it to the repository.

body.raw:
{
  "biddingCode": "culpa est deserunt",
  "type": "Ut velit aliqua",
  "status": "Ut incididunt",
  "excepted": true,
  "startingPrice": -23462120,
  "dateOfMaintenance": "1950-12-28T13:38:53.882Z",
  "startTime": "1950-05-23T21:04:27.424Z",
  "endTime": "1959-02-21T15:41:06.192Z"
}

request.description:
Sample request:
\
POST api/Bidding
{

	"biddingCode": "002",
	"type": "Javna licitacija",
	"status": "Prvi krug",
	"excepted": true,
	"startingPrice": 12000,
	"dateOfMaintenance": "2023-01-16",
	"startTime": "2023-01-16T12:00:00",
	"endTime": "2023-01-16T12:00:00"
}

response.name: Success

body.raw:
{
  "biddingCode": "culpa est deserunt",
  "type": "Ut velit aliqua",
  "status": "Ut incididunt",
  "excepted": true,
  "startingPrice": -23462120,
  "dateOfMaintenance": "1950-12-28T13:38:53.882Z",
  "startTime": "1950-05-23T21:04:27.424Z",
  "endTime": "1959-02-21T15:41:06.192Z"
}

response.name: Returns newly created Bidding

body.raw:
{
  "biddingCode": "culpa est deserunt",

}

item.name: OpeningOfBids
{id}
Gets an OpeningOfBids by ID.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to get.

response.name: Returns Opening of bids DTO with the given id

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to get.

response.name: There is no Opening of bids with this id.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to get.

item.name: Updates an existing OpeningOfBids in the database.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to update.

response.name: Returns updated opening of bids

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to update.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no opening of bids with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the OpeningOfBids to update.

item.name: Deletes the  Opening of bids entity with the specified ID from the repository.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the  Opening of bids entity to be deleted.

response.name: Returns deleted Opening of bids

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the  Opening of bids entity to be deleted.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Opening of bids with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the  Opening of bids entity to be deleted.

item.name: Gets all OpeningOfBids from the database.

response.name: Returns list of Opening of bids

item.name: Adds a new Opening of Bids to the database.

response.name: Success
Returns newly created Opening of bids

item.name: PublicBidding
{id}
Retrieves a specific Public Bidding from the database based on its ID.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to retrieve.

response.name: Returns Public Bidding  DTO with the given id

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to retrieve.

response.name: There is no Public Bidding with this id.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to retrieve.

item.name: Updates a Public Bidding in the database, changing all attributes except for the primary key.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to update.

response.name: Returns updated Public Bidding as a BiddingConditionsDTO

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to update.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Public Bidding with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to update.

item.name: Deletes a specific Public Bidding from the database.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to delete.

response.name: Returns deleted Public Bidding

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to delete.

response.name: Returns NotFound error if no Public Bidding with the given ID are found

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Public Bidding to delete.

item.name: Retrieves all Public Biddings from the database and returns them as a list of PublicBiddingDTOs.

response.name: Returns list of Public Biddings

item.name: Adds a new Public Bidding to the database.

response.name: Success
Returns newly created Public Bidding
